welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Shotley Bridge, where history meets natural beauty. Get ready to discover the quaint streets, delicious food, and friendly locals as you explore our lovely town."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Newcastle Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Newcastle Airport, mainly used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a free basic option and a paid premium option for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tees Valley Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal handles all freight and cargo operations at Tees Valley Airport.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free wifi throughout the airport.
